column5: My source in Nakina advises the snow has arrived. If this keeps up and they have spring rains many holes and pools will be available to fish. Because of low water levels this has not been the case the past few years. Maybe for a change we will have water levels at a normal level. June 1 can't come soon enough.
Apparently there is a lot of snow 3 feet + in the Armstrong / Nakina area... however.. not a lot of ice. If the ice goes out early there will be low water.
